reviewText: My admiration for the Amazon of America and Indian Music and Movie suppliers of India and our very own  here. Their hard work and dedication and loyalty made my childhood dreams come true. Of course nothing comes on the table as all with the price and the sacrifices. The three disc set of 101 Hits are from the movies I had seen most during the childhood and so and the Technology has now made it possible to be with them eternally in our homes to entertain us for all the occasions. The orthodox life of India also enables us  to draw morals to better our lives and the countries we have come to accept as our Homes. This package is remarkably digitally- mastered to be as good as the originals. Clarity of Video and Audio is excellent for most of the Hits..
Going back in time,some fond memories ignited,treasures to hold,strong stories,heartfull music,what is acting is about.
Only two DVDs are working and one is not working
